ProductsHero.title: Protect your website with advanced security
ProductsHero.description: Comprehensive protection designed to neutralize threats before they reach your site. We combine advanced encryption, real-time monitoring, and proactive defense to ensure your business remains untouchable and online.

24_7_support.title: 24/7 support
24_7_support.description: Our dedicated support team is available 24/7 via chat, email, and phone, and helps you as soon as you need us!

daily_backup.title: Daily backup
daily_backup.description: We run a backup of our entire server environment every night in case you happen to delete or break something

money_back.title: 30-day money-back guarantee
money_back.description: We guarantee that you will be satisfied with our services and therefore offer a 45-day money-back guarantee on your web hosting.

24_7_monitoring.title: 24/7 monitoring
24_7_monitoring.description: We monitor our services around the clock, and if anything goes down, our technicians receive an alert immediately.

sectigo_ssl.title: Sectigo SSL Wildcard
sectigo_ssl.description: is an important addition to have on your website.

bitninja.title: BitNinja
bitninja.description: Ultimate security for your Linux server.

managed_server.title: Managed Server
managed_server.description: Complete managed service for your server. Installation, monitoring, 24/7 technical support, and updates.

secure_web.title: Kraken Secure Web
secure_web.description: Our cleanup scanner that automatically removes malicious code from the website's database and files.

id_protection.title: ID Protection - Business
id_protection.description: With Kraken ID Protection, we guarantee that you will not be spammed by salespeople and companies.

secure_vpn.title: Kraken Secure VPN
secure_vpn.description: Browse securely by encrypting your traffic from prying eyes, hide your IP address and location. With Kraken VPN you are safe

ProductsVision.title: Unleash Your Vision. We Handle the Rest.
ProductsVision.description: We know security and integrity are important to you. That's why Kraken Hosting has thought of absolutely everything, so you, our client, can focus on what you do best: your vision, your sales, your message. Let us take care of your website, web hosting and everything in between.
